title: "From new Portuguese home, Ai Weiwei plans tribute to \"visionary\" Gorbachev"
excerpt: "Ai Weiwei, the Chinese dissident whose activist art has made him Beijing's best-known critic, has swapped life in British exile for Portugal, where, in a countryside estate east of Lisbon, he is working on a monument commemorating Mikhail Gorbachev."
